attributes.action: Grant Amnesty to undocumented British families and dependant born outside the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its time the UK government look at the benefit it can gain from giving amnesty to the thousands of undocumented people in the UK and put politics aside.
Most undocumented people in the UK have British families and the government should accept the fact that, sending them all back home will bring more problems to the families and they will then shift it to the government for help and this time of economic situation the government can not do it alone.
British families are suffering and at the same time taken care of undocumented dependents who are not allowed to work in the UK.
Allowed Amnesty to undocumented people to work and not claiming anything can help the government in generating more revenue to solve future government problems
